H0.text: What is stevia a substitute for. Sugar

H1.text: What is stevia a substitute for. Honey

H2.text: What is stevia a substitute for. Maple syrup

H3.text: What is stevia a substitute for. -Ose

A4.text: Stevia is a sweet sugar substitute that is about 50 to 300 times sweeter than sugar.

A5.text: Stevia is used in sugar- and calorie-reduced food and beverage products as an alternative for variants with sugar.
